Name: Upaon: A Snake's Journey
About the game: About this game Upaon: A Snake's Journey is a casual puzzle game that mix the classic game Snake with Sokoban mechanics. Think like a snake Every fruit collected increases the snake's size, so think carefully before eating averything in your way and... Please don't bite yourself. This game have 100 handcrafted puzzles. Find your own solution: Open-ended puzzles, every room have lots of ways to solve. 3 hours gameplay with gameplay variations each world. 5 worlds variety. Original Soundtrack by Vicent Colavita'
